EmailTemplate.name: ED-2018-10-MS Azure IaaS Solutions eBook.20180924 Email Send - Email 1 - Subject
EmailTemplate.subject: [NEW eBook] Deploying & Managing the Azure IaaS Platform
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXPkAAM]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you considering whether or not to migrate to Azure? If so, check out this NEW in-depth eBook, Microsoft Azure IaaS Solutions, Deploying and Managing the Azure Platform <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXPkAAM]]>.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXPkAAM]]>
We co-published this guide with O'Reilly to help customers deploy and manage Azure IaaS solutions for compute, network, and storage.
Inside you will learn how to:
- Deploy an Azure VM and learn how it compares to on-premises virtualization - Understand the implication and requirements for security, identity, and access - Increase the availability and recoverability of Azure storage workloads - And more!
I hope you find this information helpful as you continue your cloud migration journey.
- Megan
